Name: Amit jain
Title: NATURE SAFARI
Review: Excellent place for bird watch, photography, nature movie making, environmental education , Initiative by Forest Department Ujjain. NATURE INTERPRETATION CENTRE BUILDING needs to be decorated by wild life pics , wildlife n nature movie should be shown. Night safari and camping arrangement needed.

Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: A good initiative to promote eco tourism
Review: its a initiative by municipal corporation and govt where they are trying to establish a place where people can visit and understand the importance of nature.

Name: Kapil S
Title: Worst experience
Review: There is nothing in this park. I would not even call it a park. We paid 100 rupees for car and 10 rupees entry fee for each person. Don't waste your time and money. Stay away.

Name: prem M
Title: Nature safsri
Review: Ecotourism park created at NAULAKHI , maxi road ujjain at a 15 year old a man-made Forest (named Naulkhi bead). Initially only grass grew there but due to repeated plantation various years it transformed into a Forest . An Ecotourism Park development with the help of MPEDB, BHOPAL with an objective to provide environmental spa to people near city.One can visit this area for mental calm, digital detox, calory burning, and many more fun activities with a fresh food cafeteria to enjoy the moments.

Name: Cruiser331903
Title: When i visit there i got a lot of joy.
Review: To know the environment ,bird,nature & wild life.you may visit there with your family without any fear . but com with some sneaks ,drinking water also bcz u need in this tour.
